body:
Dear all,  
  I am working on a daylight simulation with pipeline:  
  IGDB#optics6#window7.2#ecotect2011#radiance#daysim3.1  
  Wanted to correct the suggested lines in the Daysim generated *.da file before feeding back into ecotect.  
    Is that the way the edited file should look like?    
   # UDI_100-2000 - Static Shading  # sensor_file_info 0 0 0 0
  8.937460 	 3.357410 	 0.850000 	 53  7.818620 	 3.555310 	 0.850000 	 51  10.334970 	 3.110880 	 0.850000 	 68  12.336220 	 6.915090 	 0.850000 	 57   
  Sadly,the sensor points are rotated from Ecotect into Daysim. How do I rotate them back when I return data to Ecotect or is this process automated?  
 Kind Regards,
 var m3_u = (location.protocol=='https:'?'https://a.abv.bg/www/delivery/ajs.php':'http://a.abv.bg/www/delivery/ajs.php');   var m3_r = Math.floor(Math.random()*99999999999);   if (!document.MAX_used) document.MAX_used = ',';   document.write ("  ");  Niya
___
